scripts.test: npm run lint && lerna run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && lerna run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production lerna run build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:jmeas/resourceful-redux gh-pages --force
